comment: Great sound period not hard to use. Like that equaliser fix the sound the way I like it. No cut outs either with your music mp3 player app. But I have a question how is it that you show a song on the list to be played thus when trying to play it my phone declines by showing ( file not supported) even though it shows on the app that I download from.

author: lorenzo d
comment: I haven't used all the features yet. The UI is great very easy to use!! I love the driving mode, almost thought I was going to blow up my amp or subwoofer but they are ok. I t still think this is a superb

It is really really good, easy to download music. Also! Although was confused at first, I got the hang of it and then I didn't have to buy the app in order to listen offline! I absolutely loved this app, and I'm sure you would too!

author: Michael Kozakewich
comment: Very good! You can see all your songs, or your playlists, or play whole folders, and you can see what's currently enqueued! Also a dark theme and equalizer. I can't understand why other music players (looking at you, Google Play!) can't have all this basic functionality.

author: Ashutosh punj
comment: Its good but when you save a playlist and the app gets updated its all gone. You have to do it every single time. Other wise its kinda best but the playlist problem let me down and amde me switch a different player!

author: Kelsey Hinote
comment: I haven't used this app in a while lol but I didn't need it on my old phone but I do on my LG Stylo 3 cuz it didn't come with a music player but Google Music which I don't like using cuz I found a bug they was talking about on there so this app it is the ads are on the bottom not the whole screen so thanks

author: Dharmendrareddy Thippu
comment: When I move the songs to SD card I can't see the songs in music player. Can you please help me out. I did scan of library also but still it is not working fine.

reply.author: mytechnosound
reply.content: Hi Dharmendrareddy Thippu, Thank you for using music player .The issue you faced may be due to media store updation delay.Kindly restart your phone and try again.sorry for the inconvenience.

author: Charl van zyl
comment: Really love this music player very clear and the fact it has an equalizer with bass boost and virtual sound settings is a major A+, best part of it all is the app is free of charge. Would be 5 stars if there were no ads.....

author: Keith McCord
comment: I just downloaded this' so I haven't used it to know how good it is. It seems that the sound quality is the best from all my previous apps. But I have only listened to one song so far.

author: SrinivasaRao Puppala
comment: The best app forever even with mp3cutter. Awesome graphical equalizer great  performance with sound surrounding via earphone. Good job developers.really great app. I request you to please add the merger option also it will be in top of the app. Thank you developers.

comment: Love this app! So easy to use. Never have any issues. Works great! Been using for years.

author: Sonny Punuh
comment: I previously gave a 5 then 4 star review, but since it constantly asked me to review it again every time I want to close the app, I took a star from my review.
